definition: lit. to punish those before to prevent those after (idiom); to criticize former mistakes firmly to prevent them happening again
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: By ignorance we mistake, and by mistake we learn.
sentences.chinese: 無知使人犯錯，有錯當懲前毖後。

sentences.english: As one of the most used tool to fight against corruption, the cost of monitoring is too high.
sentences.chinese: 打擊腐敗固然能懲前毖後，但成本過高。
